description: GQFT-specialized branch of the collider framework, integrating Yue-Liang Wu's 2024-2025 Gravitational Quantum Field Theory as physics substrate. Focuses on spin/scaling gauge symmetries, 6 GW polarizations, and LISA-testable predictions. Maintains shared core for v1.6 compatibility.

manifold.formula: M (Riemannian with Fisher metric g_ij = E[∂_i log p · ∂_j log p])
manifold.notes: Belief space; integrates GQFT compactness via spin gauge flows.

path_integral.name: Z
path_integral.notes: Unifier; stationary phase yields GR/SM emergence via SP(1,3) symmetry.

action.notes: General Standard Model (GSM) action with gravigauge field; derives all laws via gauge invariances.

free_energy.notes: Bridges to GQFT via entropy in gauge fields.

integrated_equation.formula: dξ/dt = -∇_g F - λ_eff ∇_g ρ + ∇ · J_S + κ Φ(ρ)
integrated_equation.notes: Dynamics over GQFT substrate; conatus from gauge symmetries.

physics_substrate.gqft: Spin gauge SP(1,3) and scaling by Wu (2024-2025); renormalizable; suppresses birefringence <10^{-6}; predicts 6 GW modes.

gravitational_waves.path: Yields 6 polarizations: 2 tensor (GR), 2 vector, 2 scalar; SymPy verified.

phases.phase_1: GQFT module integration; LISA prediction pipeline.

metadata.synthesis: Evolves from v1.5A; tool-verified via arXiv searches.
